text: Phoebe Lucille Bridgers (born August 17, 1994 in Pasadena, California) is an American singer-songwriter and indie folk/indie pop music artist. She was nominated for eleven Grammy Awards. She won four of them. Bridgers is a progressive and liberal activist. ==Discography== Solo studio albums * Stranger in the Alps (2017) * Punisher (2020) * The Better Oblivion Community Center (2019) Boygenius * The Record (2023) ==References== Category:21st- century American singer-songwriters Category:1994 births Category:American folk musicians Category:Bisexual people Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Indie rock Category:LGBT people from California Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT songwriters Category:Living people Category:Singers from Pasadena, California
title: Phoebe Bridgers
